thread.title: UAW Ford Negotiators' Video Says Givebacks Are Done
thread.title_full: UAW Ford Negotiators' Video Says Givebacks Are Done

title: UAW Ford Negotiators' Video Says Givebacks Are Done
text:
UAW Ford Negotiators’ Video Says Givebacks Are Done Timing of release on Facebook is unique, comes less than two weeks before four-year deal expires By jeff.bennett@wsj.com Sept. 4, 2015 1:53 p.m. ET 
Ford Motor Co.’s hourly labor costs in the U.S. are roughly $9 an hour higher than Toyota Motor Co. and $15 more than Nissan Motor Co. But counting on the United Auto Workers to help bridge the gap looks like a dead end. 
The UAW’s Ford negotiating department late Thursday posted a YouTube video indicating the era of givebacks is over. The message of the video, featuring various bargainers talking to union members, is somewhat... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
